document_data.name: Zezania Tarth-Kelet
document_data.mainbody: '''Zezania Tarth-Kelet''' was a [[Chultan (ethnicity)|Chultan]] [[human]] woman from [[Tashalar]]. She was a priestess of [[Shar]] and a member of [[Demarch's Folly]], an organization dedicated to learning [[shadow magic]].
document_data.Abilities: Zezania was a [[wizard]] and [[cleric]] of Shar who studied [[divine magic]], [[arcane]] magic, and [[shadow magic]], and was able to use the [[Shadow Weave]]. She combined these diverse paths of study as a [[mystic theurge]], and also developed as a [[child of night]].
document_data.History: Interested in shadow magic and curious about the [[Shadow Weave]], members of [[Demarch's Folly]] sought out someone who could use both. They discovered Zezania. She agreed to join their organization and provided guidance in their efforts.{{Cite web/Class Chronicles: Shadowcasters|}}
